name: The Purging of Darkstorm Cave by the Hero(s) ____
name_original: The Purging of Darkstorm Cave by the Hero(s) ____
description:
Made for the Little Awful Jam 18 gamejam, over 16 days from Jan 5th to 21st. Everything in this game made by Giggs, except the font, which is BetterPixels by AmericanHamster

All audio made in Famitracker

Art made in Photoshop

Game made in Game Maker: Studio

Setup:

The Annalist exists outside of and at the end of and also I guess during all time? In any case they're bored and flipping through their history of all things that ever happen and come across the story of Darkstorm Cave, where for centuries a Demon held it's lair. In that time many people died as a consequence of this Demon, and the Annalist has decided to see if they can't make a better time of clearing it out with the help of (several) conjured heroes.

Controls:

WASD: Move
LCTRL / Q / E: Special abilities
ARROWS: Default attack / Cast directable spells
ESCAPE: Pause
+/-  or i/k: Volume up or down
